parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource config request

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource config request

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description:
Provides the details of the backed up item. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation,
call the GetItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose details are to be fetched.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

put.description:
Enables backup of an item or to modifies the backup policy information of an already backed up item. This is an
asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backup item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Item name to be backed up.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource backed up item

delete.description:
Used to disable backup of an item within a container. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the
request, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item to be deleted.

get.description: Fetches the result of any operation on the backup item.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backup item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backup item name whose details are to be fetched.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: OperationID which represents the operation whose result needs to be fetched.

get.description: Lists the backup copies for the backed up item.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item whose backup copies are to be fetched.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

get.description:
Provides the information of the backed up data identified using RecoveryPointID. This is an asynchronous operation.
To know the status of the operation, call the GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose backup data needs to be fetched.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: RecoveryPointID represents the backed up data to be fetched.

post.description:
Restores the specified backed up data. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of this API call, use
GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item to be restored.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: Recovery point ID which represents the backed up data to be restored.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource restore request

get.description:
Lists of backup policies associated with Recovery Services Vault. API provides pagination parameters to fetch
scoped results.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

get.description:
Provides the details of the backup policies associated to Recovery Services Vault. This is an asynchronous
operation. Status of the operation can be fetched using GetPolicyOperationResult API.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: Backup policy information to be fetched.

put.description:
Creates or modifies a backup policy. This is an asynchronous operation. Status of the operation can be fetched
using GetPolicyOperationResult API.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: Backup policy to be created.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource backup policy

get.description: Provides the result of an operation.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: Backup policy name whose operation's result needs to be fetched.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: Operation ID which represents the operation whose result needs to be fetched.

get.description: Provides a pageable list of jobs.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: skipToken Filter.

get.description: Gets extended information associated with the job.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job whose details are to be fetched.

post.description:
Cancels a job. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the cancellation, call
GetCancelOperationResult API.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to cancel.

get.description: Fetches the result of any operation.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Job name whose operation result has to be fetched.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: OperationID which represents the operation whose result has to be fetched.

get.description:
Gets the operation result of operation triggered by Export Jobs API. If the operation is successful, then it also
contains URL of a Blob and a SAS key to access the same. The blob contains exported jobs in JSON serialized format.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: OperationID which represents the export job.

post.description: Triggers export of jobs specified by filters and returns an OperationID to track.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

get.description: Provides a pageable list of all items that are backed up within a vault.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter options.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: skipToken Filter.

post.description: Validate operation for specified backed up item. This is a synchronous operation.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: resource validate operation request

AzureFileshareProtectedItem.description: Azure File Share workload-specific backup item.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the fileshare represented by this backup item.

protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

extendedInfo.description: Additional information with this backup item.

AzureFileshareProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information about Azure File Share backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

resourceState.description: Indicates the state of this resource. Possible values are from enum ResourceState {Invalid, Active, SoftDeleted, Deleted}

resourceStateSyncTime.description: The resource state sync time for this backup item.

AzureFileShareRecoveryPoint.description: Azure File Share workload specific backup copy.

recoveryPointType.description: Type of the backup copy. Specifies whether it is a crash consistent backup or app consistent.

fileShareSnapshotUri.description: Contains Url to the snapshot of fileshare, if applicable

restoreFileSpecs.description: List of Source Files/Folders(which need to recover) and TargetFolderPath details

workLoadType.description: Type of workload for the backup management

settings.description: Common settings for the backup management

subProtectionPolicy.description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

extendedInfo.description:
Extended Info that provides data directory details. Will be populated in two cases:
When a specific recovery point is accessed using GetRecoveryPoint
Or when ListRecoveryPoints is called for Log RP only with ExtendedInfo query filter

dataDirectoryTimeInUTC.description: UTC time at which data directory info was captured

dataDirectoryPaths.description: List of data directory paths during restore operation.

AzureWorkloadSQLRestoreRequest.description: AzureWorkload SQL -specific restore. Specifically for full/diff restore

shouldUseAlternateTargetLocation.description: Default option set to true. If this is set to false, alternate data directory must be provided

isNonRecoverable.description: SQL specific property where user can chose to set no-recovery when restore operation is tried

storageTypeState.description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.

secretVaultId.description: ID of the Key Vault where this Secret is stored.

startDate.description: Backup copies created after this time.

endDate.description: Backup copies created before this time.

extendedInfo.description: In Get Recovery Point, it tells whether extended information about recovery point is asked.

diskLunList.description: List of Disks' Logical Unit Numbers (LUN) to be used for VM Protection.

isInclusionList.description: Flag to indicate whether DiskLunList is to be included/ excluded from backup.

daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

isLast.description: Whether Date is last date of month

recommendations.description: List of localized recommendations for above error code.

dpmServerName.description: DPM server name managing the backup item or backup job.

containerName.description: Name of cluster/server protecting current backup item, if any.

actionsInfo.description: The state/actions applicable on this job like cancel/retry.

DpmJobExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on the DPM workload-specific job.

tasksList.description: List of tasks associated with this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message on job execution.

backupEngineName.description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

extendedInfo.description: Extended info of the backup item.

protectableObjectLoadPath.description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

protected.description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

isPresentOnCloud.description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup status information on backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time on backup item.

isCollocated.description: To check if backup item is collocated.

protectionGroupName.description: Protection group name of the backup item.

EncryptionDetails.description: Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

encryptionEnabled.description: Identifies whether this backup copy represents an encrypted VM at the time of backup.

kekVaultId.description: ID of Key Vault where KEK is stored.

secretKeyVaultId.description: ID of Key Vault where Secret is stored.

ErrorDetail.description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

message.description: Error Message related to the Code.

ExportJobsOperationResultInfo.description: This class is used to send blob details after exporting jobs.

blobUrl.description: URL of the blob into which the serialized string of list of jobs is exported.

blobSasKey.description: SAS key to access the blob. It expires in 15 mins.

excelFileBlobUrl.description: URL of the blob into which the ExcelFile is uploaded.

excelFileBlobSasKey.description: SAS key to access the blob. It expires in 15 mins.

ExtendedProperties.description: Extended Properties for Azure IaasVM Backup.

subProtectionPolicy.description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

protectedItemId.description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

sourceAssociations.description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

fabricName.description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

expand.description: Specifies if the additional information should be provided for this item.

IaasVMRecoveryPoint.description: IaaS VM workload specific backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

sourceVMStorageType.description: Storage type of the VM whose backup copy is created.

isSourceVMEncrypted.description: Identifies whether the VM was encrypted when the backup copy is created.

keyAndSecret.description: Required details for recovering an encrypted VM. Applicable only when IsSourceVMEncrypted is true.

isInstantIlrSessionActive.description: Is the session to recover items from this backup copy still active.

isManagedVirtualMachine.description: Whether VM is with Managed Disks

recoveryPointId.description: ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

sourceResourceId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM which is being recovered.

targetVirtualMachineId.description:
This is the complete ARM Id of the VM that will be created.
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

targetResourceGroupId.description:
This is the ARM Id of the resource group that you want to create for this Virtual machine and other artifacts.
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}

storageAccountId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the storage account to which the VM has to be restored.

virtualNetworkId.description:
This is the virtual network Id of the vnet that will be attached to the virtual machine.
User will be validated for join action permissions in the linked access.

subnetId.description:
Subnet ID, is the subnet ID associated with the to be restored VM. For Classic VMs it would be
{VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName} and, for the Azure Resource Manager VMs it would be ARM resource ID used to represent
the subnet.

targetDomainNameId.description:
Fully qualified ARM ID of the domain name to be associated to the VM being restored. This applies only to Classic
Virtual Machines.

region.description: Region in which the virtual machine is restored.

affinityGroup.description: Affinity group associated to VM to be restored. Used only for Classic Compute Virtual Machines.

createNewCloudService.description:
Should a new cloud service be created while restoring the VM. If this is false, VM will be restored to the same
cloud service as it was at the time of backup.

encryptionDetails.description: Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

restoreDiskLunList.description: List of Disk LUNs for partial restore

Job.description: Defines workload agnostic properties for a job.

entityFriendlyName.description: Friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type to execute the current job.

jobType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the job.

startTime.description: Job has started at this time. Value is in UTC.

endTime.description: Job has ended at this time. Value is in UTC.

JobResource.description: Defines workload agnostic properties for a job.

KEKDetails.description: KEK is encryption key for BEK.

keyVaultId.description: Key Vault ID where this Key is stored.

KeyAndSecretDetails.description:
BEK is bitlocker key.
KEK is encryption key for BEK
If the VM was encrypted then we will store following details :
1. Secret(BEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId.
2. Key(KEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId.
3. EncryptionMechanism
BEK and KEK can potentially have different vault ids.

kekDetails.description: KEK is encryption key for BEK.

yearlySchedule.description: Yearly retention schedule of the protection policy.

count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

retentionPolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

retentionDuration.description: Retention duration of the protection policy.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunDays.description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.
